english.segment1: Verse: Is this the hour that. You promised us would come . In this moment may. Your will not mine be done
english.segment2: Pre-Chorus: I'm broken and open to worship You . Humbly and freely in Spirit and in Truth
english.segment3: Chorus 1: So deep I hear You walking . So strong it makes me weak . So high I feel the wind of angel's wings
english.segment5: Chorus 2: So still I hear a rumbling . So real it's like a dream . So true You come to rest and sing with me
